description: This file defines React functional components for displaying skeleton loading placeholders, including a generic Skeleton component and a ListSkeleton component that renders multiple Skeleton instances within a styled container.

methods.name: Skeleton({ height = 14, width = '100%', style })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a stylized div acting as a loading placeholder with customizable height, width, and additional styles.

methods.name: ListSkeleton({ rows = 5 })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a list of Skeleton components arranged in a grid layout, simulating a list of loading items with optional number of rows.
